name: Gauntlet of time
description:
----How to Play----

you must find the exit 
(it is a purple portal)

controls are wasd for move cntrl to fall down and space to jump

avoid dying to the flame traps

if you die you will pick up as a past version of yourself (dont touch them either)

avoid the creature that looks like a silhouette of you.
Have fun, maybe spoilers for the episode

Game is based off a Doctor who episode
"journey to the center of the tards"
all art and code assets were created by us during the duration of game jam

Game made by Aidan Bowers(Deusignis) & Luke Richards (silkyrie)
